section.class: paragraph--id--1 paragraph paragraph--type--hero-image paragraph--view-mode--default page-feature large

div.h1: Welcome to Cal Poly Maritime Academy

section.class: paragraph--id--16 paragraph paragraph--type--generic-content-grid paragraph--view-mode--default primary-grid-section w-bg-maritime mc mc-grid

div.p: Located at our scenic waterfront Cal Poly Solano Campus in Vallejo, California, Cal Poly Maritime Academy is the only degree-granting maritime academy on the West Coast. With our Learn by Doing approach, you'll gain hands-on experience and build strong leadership skills for a successful future.

div.class: field-wrapper field field-paragraph--field-pg-content-grid field-name-field-pg-content-grid field-type-entity-reference-revisions field-label-hidden primary-grid
field-wrapper field field-paragraph--field-textarea-content field-name-field-textarea-content field-type-text-long field-label-hidden grid-item-content
field-wrapper field field-paragraph--field-textarea-content field-name-field-textarea-content field-type-text-long field-label-hidden grid-item-content
field-wrapper field field-paragraph--field-textarea-content field-name-field-textarea-content field-type-text-long field-label-hidden grid-item-content
paragraph--id--31 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image-list paragraph--view-mode--default content-w-media-group w-bg-white mc

section.class: paragraph--id--28 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image paragraph--view-mode--default content-w-media left

div.class: field-wrapper paragraph paragraph--type-- wow content cell

div.p: Chart your career path with degree programs that blend classroom learning combined with real-world experience, cutting-edge technology, leadership development and global perspective. Graduate with the skills to deliver lasting impact in high-demand industries.

img.alt: Student climbing up the side of a ship

div.class: paragraph--id--27 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image-list paragraph--view-mode--default split-content-w-media-group w-bg-maritime mc

section.class: paragraph--id--26 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image paragraph--view-mode--default split-content-w-media right

div.class: field-wrapper paragraph paragraph--type-- wow content small-12 xlarge-6 animated

div.p: Learning goes beyond the classroom; it spans across oceans into real-world industries. As an undergraduate, you will complete an internship gaining hands-on experience while developing the confidence and skills that set you apart. Take your education further with our Semester at Sea where you’ll travel the world aboard our 500-foot Training Ship Golden Bear.

div.class: paragraph--id--146 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image-list paragraph--view-mode--default content-w-media-group w-bg-white mc

section.class: paragraph--id--145 paragraph paragraph--type--two-columns-with-image paragraph--view-mode--default content-w-media left

div.class: field-wrapper paragraph paragraph--type-- wow content cell

div.p: As a member of the Corps of Cadets, you’ll be part of a close-knit community where leadership, discipline and Learn by Doing is part of each day. From the classroom to the ship, cadets gain the skills and experiences to thrive in high-demand global industries. In addition to hands-on training, cadets have opportunities to expand leadership skills through internships, conferences and more—broadening perspectives, building networks and sharpening leadership abilities on a global stage.

p.a: Learn more about Corps of Cadets

img.alt: Three female cadets smile in front of a stone building.

section.class: paragraph--id--420 paragraph paragraph--type--content-list-news paragraph--view-mode--default highlighted-news w-bg-light mc

div.div: Making History with First-Ever At-Sea FCC Amateur Radio Testing

img.alt: Training Ship Golden Bear arriving in Seattle

div.div: Seattle - Summer Sea Term's fifth and final port.

img.alt: Cadets in the ballast tank of Training Ship Golden Bear

div.div: Less than two weeks remain for Summer Sea Term.

img.alt: Cadets on a break aboard Training Ship Golden Bear's Summer Sea Term

div.div: Crossing back over the International Date Line allowed us to live June 22 twice.
